Sporadic Creativity

Artist // Engineer // Self-Learner

About Myself

lightbulb_outline
border_color
format_color_fill

I love discovering shades. Bright and dull, dark and light, vibrant and dead, every tinch of color has its own place in a palette. Its funny how they compete to get on the canvas. I am an engineering student, given my love for science. My passion for fine arts makes the whole process of learning so much more creative, helping me to think out of the box.
Its aptly said: where Science ends, Art begins.
